text.summary: In this open letter to President Mikhail Gorbachev of the Soviet Union, a group of American economists applaud Soviet efforts to transition to a free market economy while also cautioning against private collection of rental payments for land, instead advocating for all citizens to pay rents to the government in exchange for public services and utilities.
